message:
Asp.Net Web Api : I wonder how to secure api request from client side javascript using userName & Password
Scenario : supposing i intend to develop mobile application using any common mobile hybrid framework and my interaction 
whith the data is through Asp.Net Web Api and i'm securing my api using username and password.

data.message:
You can use normal asp.net authentication. Webforms auth is just a cookie you know
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15994857/webapi-forms-authentication-simplemembershipprovider-using-windowsidentity-w
Another option is using basic authentication. With Web Api 2.x it's OWIN so no IIS setting needed, just setup OWIN, and from the JS side, auth is just a request header
Thanks Mohamed Meligy i guess i will go for OWin and making some proof of concept
Use OAuth 2.0 (complex) or simple auth (send Username and Password on each request)
Authentication is one problem but securing communication is also important, consider putting an SSL Certificate too to encrypt communication in general
